name: Exoswap
overview: Exoswap is a Decentralized Swap Connecting Stratos Ecosystem to external Blockchain Ecosystems
description:
Exoswap is a Decentralized Application (DApp) that interacts with multiple EVM-based chains like Stratos, Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, and others to provide users with functionalities such as: 
Exoswap bridge (ERC20 token transfer between EVM chains);
Exoswap bridge is a scaling solution for connection between EVM chains with own DEX. Compared to an existing solution for the bridge side, which suffers from slow speed and significantly higher gas costs for its executions, we have taken a different approach. Our method relies on SAO and witnesses to process and verify bridge transactions, ensuring protection against fraud, all while achieving fast confirmation times.
Exoswap bridge is a blockchain application designed to facilitate seamless token transitions between EVM chains. Our hardworking team has been focused on implementing the Nexus bridge, enabling smooth transitions between multiple chains simultaneously.
Architecturally, the beauty of Exoswap bridge lies in its simple and straightforward design, which enables fast and cost-effective transactions for transferring tokens between EVM chains.

name: Big Dipper Explorer
overview: Big Dipper is an open-source block explorer and token management tool serving over 25 proof-of-stake blockchains.
description: Big Dipper started as a Cosmos community project in 2018. It was designed as an explorer tool for blockchains that are based on Cosmos SDK, providing optimal user experience with near real-time on-chain data. Big Dipper utilizes different endpoints from Tendermint, Cosmos SDK and the Command Line Interface to aggregate data into a single web interface.

name: Blockscout Explorer
overview: Blockscout is a tool for inspecting and analyzing EVM based blockchains.
description: Blockscout is optimized for next-level blockchain exploration. Multichain, highly configurable, and open source, the explorer portal opens up access to all chain data and functionality. Search blocks, transactions and addresses, then go beyond to connect and interact with apps, bridges, wallets and more. The blockchain universe is yours to explore!

name: Show Today
overview: Stratos Ecosystem Show Case
description: Welcome to the Stratos Ecosystem - a future-proof, censorship-resistant platform where your data, videos, audios, pictures and files are truly yours.

name: Polygon
overview: Polygon Labs pioneers Ethereum scaling solutions, fostering widespread adoption among tens of thousands of decentralized apps and well-known enterprises like Aave and Robinhood, while leading the charge towards carbon negativity in Web3.
description: Polygon Labs develops Ethereum scaling solutions for Polygon protocols. Polygon Labs engages with other ecosystem developers to help make available scalable, affordable, secure and sustainable blockchain infrastructure for Web3. Polygon Labs has initially developed a growing suite of protocols for developers to gain easy access to major scaling solutions, including Layer 2s (zero-knowledge rollups), sidechains, app-specific chains and data availability protocols. Scaling solutions that Polygon Labs initially developed have seen widespread adoption with tens of thousands of decentralized apps, unique addresses exceeding 350 million, 1.6 million smart contracts created and 3 billion total transactions processed since inception. The existing Polygon network is home for some of the biggest Web3 projects, such as Aave, Uniswap, and OpenSea, and well-known enterprises, including Robinhood, Stripe and Adobe. Polygon Labs is carbon neutral with the goal of leading Web3 in becoming carbon negative.

name: Artizyou
overview: Artizyou™ is a solution dedicated to the protection and promotion of creatives.
description: Artizyou™ is a solution dedicated to the protection and promotion of creatives. Artizyou™ uses the highest level of artificial intelligence and the legendary safety of the Blockchain.

name: Devolved AI
overview: Devolved AI champions a future where Artificial Intelligence is democratically fueled by a diverse global community, aiming to dismantle AI centralization and ensure its equitable service to all.
description: Devolved AI is not merely a tech entity; it is a beacon for a future where Artificial Intelligence is democratically powered by a diverse, global community. Our mission is to dismantle the centralization of AI technology, ensuring it serves the many instead of the few.

name: 7007.Studio
overview: 7007.studio enables model creators to tokenize and publish their models on the Blockchain, revolutionizing AI through transparent on-chain publishing and fair creator compensation.
description: 7007.studio allows model creators to publish developed models and establish each model token on Blockchain. It revolutionizes AI with transparent, on-chain model publishing and creator compensation.

name: NVIDIA
overview: NVIDIA Inception is designed to help startups evolve faster through cutting-edge technology, opportunities to connect with venture capitalists, and access to the latest technical resources from NVIDIA.
description: NVIDIA Inception is designed to help startups evolve faster through cutting-edge technology, opportunities to connect with venture capitalists, and access to the latest technical resources from NVIDIA.

name: Tensorage
overview: Tensorage is a project running on Bittensor, providing storage to Bittensor for data processing.
description: Tensorage is a project running on Bittensor, providing storage to Bittensor for data processing.

name: StakingCabin
overview: Staking Cabin offers specialized validator services for proof-of-stake protocols, ensuring safe asset staking for participation in the next generation of the internet.
description:
Specializing in validator services for proof-of-stake protocols.
Participate in the next generation of the internet by staking assets safely.

name: BlockSec
overview: BlockSec pioneers blockchain security infrastructure with a seasoned team of researchers and experts, known for their publications, zero-day attack discoveries in DeFi, and protection of over $14 million in digital assets.
description: BlockSec is dedicated to building blockchain security infrastructure. The team is founded by top-notch security researchers and experienced experts from both academia and industry.We have published multiple blockchain security papers in prestigious conferences, reported several zero-day attacks of DeFi applications, and successfully protected digital assets that are worth more than 14 million dollars by blocking multiple attacks.

name: Atlas
overview: Atlas is a Singapore headquartered global blockchain infrastructure-as-a-service (IAAS) group offering a broad range of value-added services including distributed high-performance computing, node infrastructure, networking, hardware, API support and storage to drive and maintain the Web 3.0 ecosystem.
description: Atlas is a Singapore headquartered global blockchain infrastructure-as-a-service (IAAS) group offering a broad range of value-added services including distributed high-performance computing, node infrastructure, networking, hardware, API support and storage to drive and maintain the Web 3.0 ecosystem.

name: Polkastarter
overview: Polkastarter leads decentralized fundraising, granting early access to rigorously vetted IDOs, NFT sales, and gaming ventures.
description: Polkastarter is a leading decentralized fundraising platform allowing you to participate early in highly-vetted IDOs, NFT sales & gaming projects.

name: Somee
overview: SoMee is a blockchain-based, Web3 enabled social media platform redefining social media privacy, control, and monetization.
description: SoMee is a blockchain-based, Web3 enabled social media platform redefining social media privacy, control, and monetization.

name: ColdStack
overview: ColdStack is a Decentralized Cloud Aggregator, which provides an S3 endpoint to the most effective decentralized storages.
description: ColdStack is a Decentralized Cloud Aggregator, which provides an S3 endpoint to the most effective decentralized storages.

name: NodeStake
overview: NodeStake is the professional validator, infrastructure provider and IBC relayer.
description: NodeStake is the professional validator, infrastructure provider and IBC relayer.

name: Yom
overview: YOM pioneers a cutting-edge decentralized pixel-streaming network tailored for cloud gaming, providing features like voice chat, multiplayer capabilities, cross-device controls, and advanced analytics.
description: YOM, known for its state-of-the-art decentralised pixel-streaming network focusing on cloud gaming offering solutions such as voice chat, multiplayer capabilities, cross-device controls, platform and data feed integrations and analytics.

name: Ebunker
overview: Ebunker, a pioneering non-custodial ETH staking service provider, offers Staking as a Service (StaaS) and Validator as a Service (VaaS).
description: Our innovative approach has led to substantial growth, with over 350,000 Ethereum currently staked in our system. We are a strategic partner of Lido, managing 8,906 nodes, and are actively involved in DVT and SSV testing with Lido. Our strategic partnership with SSV last year further affirms our expertise in node operation, as recognized by leading protocols in the industry. Our significant contribution, aside from staking services, is the development of eNode, a home-use Ethereum validator device that democratizes access to Ethereum's network for individuals.

name: Nimble Network
overview: Nimble is building the first-ever decentralized AI framework
description: Nimble is building an aggregation layer for AI, enabling enterprise-grade AI to be powered by on-chain infrastructure. The protocol enables composability for AI models, compute, and training data. Developers can leverage models from the world’s AI engineers, data from the public data aggregators, and compute from the globally distributed infrastructure providers to build bespoke applications and custom models. A world class market layer is built to dispatch generic AI operations together with omni-chain access.

name: EMC Protocol
overview: EdgeMatrix Computing (EMC) stands as a pioneering force in the global landscape of AI DePIN and AI computing power application networks.
description: EMC Protocol: This protocol enhances the efficiency of distributed GPU clusters tailored for AI model training and inference services. EMC Hub: Serving as a comprehensive resource for community users, EMC Hub offers access to an AI model library, developer services, and an AI dApp launcher. RWA GPU DeFi: Aimed at improving asset liquidity for nodes and networks, this product also provides innovative financing solutions to stakeholders.

name: Arbitrum
overview: Designed with you in mind, Arbitrum is the leading Layer 2 technology that empowers you to explore and build in the largest Layer 1 ecosystem, Ethereum.
description: With a powerful suite of Layer 2 scaling solutions, Arbitrum is shaping the future of Ethereum. Arbitrum technology makes it possible for projects to leverage Ethereum's security to build next-gen apps.

name: Entangle
overview: Entangle infrastructure enables developers to create customized data pathways for on-chain and off-chain data, facilitating communication between smart contracts across any network.
description: Entangle is the one-stop shop for any network, protocol, or asset seeking the core primitives necessary to connect to the wider blockchain ecosystem and the tools to source data from both traditional Web2 and Web3 environments. Aligning seamlessly with Consensys’ vision of making web3 universally easy to use, Entangle’s infrastructure can now be leveraged on Linea to simplify complex blockchain functionalities and enhance accessibility, democratizing the technological landscape and delivering a unified, customizable and efficient Web3 ecosystem.

name: IoTeX
overview: IoTeX is a web3 platform that connects smart devices to blockchain Dapps.
description: IoTeX is a platform that combines blockchain technology with the Internet of Things (IoT) and smart devices. Its primary business activities include providing fast and secure blockchain solutions, connecting real-world data to decentralized applications (Dapps), and developing blockchain-powered devices such as home security cameras and cellular-IoT prototyping platforms. IoTeX aims to power billions of devices and decentralized applications across the physical and digital world.

name: Cluster Protocol
overview: Proof of compute protocol and Open Source Community for decentralized AI models.
description: Cluster Protocol is a framework designed to revolutionize the way we approach computation, data sharing, and artificial intelligence. At its core, Cluster Protocol fosters a secure, efficient, and community-driven environment for AI development and deployment powered by Fully Homomorphic Encryption. It bridges the gap between data providers, AI practitioners, and computational resource contributors by leveraging decentralization, privacy-preserving technologies, and collective intelligence.

name: Guarda Wallet
overview: Guarda Wallet is a non-custodial multi-crypto wallet
description: Guarda Wallet is a non-custodial multi-crypto wallet that supports over 60 chains and thousands of tokens, providing secure storage and management of crypto assets across web, desktop, and mobile platforms. It empowers users with tools for seamless transactions, staking, and more, all while maintaining full user control over their assets. Guarda's goal is to enhance the accessibility and security of cryptocurrency management, making it easy and safe for users to engage with a wide array of blockchain networks and tokens.

name: Dedium
overview: Decentralized GPU Computing Network on Cardano.
description: Empowering individuals to harness their idle GPUs, democratizing the GPU market, and earning rewards. This results in lower costs for developers, commercial users, and creators, fostering an environment that encourages innovation.

name: Ping Pub Explorer
overview: A light explorer for Cosmos-based Blockchains.
description: Ping Dashboard stands out by providing a real-time exploration of blockchain data without relying on caching or pre-processing. It exclusively fetches data from the Cosmos full node via LCD/RPC endpoints, ensuring a truly authentic experience. This approach is referred to as the "Light Explorer."
